law.catch_line: A majority of the members then serving on the Board is a quorum....

text.section: A majority of the members then serving on the Board is a quorum.
The Board shall meet at least five times a year, with at least two meetings being held between January 1 and April 15.

Each member of the Board is entitled to:
compensation in accordance with the State budget; and
reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.
The Board may employ staff in accordance with the State budget.
